summary: This document is an email chain from December 2020 regarding a new client seeking therapy for victimization by Jeffrey Epstein. The emails discuss confirming the individual's status as a confirmed victim and approving treatment to begin on December 8, 2020.

persons.name: M.S.
persons.context: A licensed psychotherapist certified in sexual abuse trauma who is initiating treatment for a new client who is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'Mr. Epstein', identified as the perpetrator of the victimization for which the new client is seeking therapy.

connections.description: M.S. is providing therapy to a confirmed victim of Jeffrey Epstein's abuse.

events.title: Scheduled therapy session for Epstein victim
events.description: A therapy session is scheduled to begin for a confirmed victim of Jeffrey Epstein's abuse.

locations.name: Greenacres, Florida 33463
locations.context: Location of the licensed psychotherapist M.S.

keyFacts: A new client reached out for therapy regarding victimization by Jeffrey Epstein.
Internal email correspondence seeks confirmation that the client is a 'confirmed victim' before approving treatment.
Treatment was scheduled to begin on December 8, 2020, with a licensed psychotherapist certified in sexual abuse trauma.
